Unity: 3D Indie Game

My team and I created a story-driven exploration game. You play as police officer Joe Larnet who wants to unveil the reason behind the mysterious disappearance of his old friend.

Created with Unity, C# and Maya.

Go to Gamejolt Site Watch a Playthrough

HTML & CSS: Prototype Websites

Two websites created utilizing the BEM-Methodology and the Sass preprocessor.

The nature site is a float-based construction, while the real estate site was created with the new grid system.

Open Nature Site Open Real Estate Site

Javascript: Budget Calculator

Browser application that calculates and displays your budget based on your inputs.

Created utilizing Webpack, Babel and a few ES6 features.

Open Budget Calculator
